sections.heading: Texas adoption services for expectant/birth mothers
paragraphs: Are you considering giving your baby up for adoption in Texas? Since 1986, Adoptions With Love has been helping expectant/birth mothers across Texas make thoughtful adoption plans. We are a licensed, not-for-profit, domestic adoption agency that specializes in giving guidance and loving support to women looking to make an adoption plan. At Adoptions with Love, our mission is to make you and your baby’s best interests a top priority. Here, we recognize that you are not “giving up” your baby. Rather, you are giving your baby an opportunity at life that you may not be ready to provide. Adoption is a brave and loving choice.

sections.heading: A Flexible Plan for YOU
paragraphs: When creating an adoption plan it is important to fully grasp what is best for you AND what is best for your child. At Adoptions With Love, we let YOU be in charge of making a personalized adoption plan that best suits your needs. That means you get to choose the life you want your baby to live.

Giving your baby up for adoption does not mean you are giving up. Rather, you are making a loving plan for your child’s life. As you create your adoption plan, you will have the opportunity to decide on important factors such as:
Learn how to make an adoption plan in Texas.
list: Deciding on the best family for your baby. Selecting the right family is completely up to your discretion. If you wish, we will provide you with comprehensive information and photo albums of our prospective families who are ready to adopt. You can choose the family that you think is the best match for your baby. Each of our families has been very carefully screened with background checks and we have been to each of their homes. We can also arrange an in-person meeting or set up a call with a family at your convenience.

Choosing between an open or closed adoption plan. You design the type of adoption you want: open adoption, semi-open adoption, or closed adoption. The right plan is the plan with which you feel most comfortable. If you choose to have a closed adoption, you can open it at a later date. Our flexible options give a sense of security that is especially welcome during this difficult time.

sections.heading: Professional Services for Open Adoption in Texas
paragraphs: All of our services at Adoptions With Love are 100% free. Our job is to provide you with the services you need to have a comfortable and positive adoption experience. Adoptions With Love is ready to assist with these expenses:

Adoptions With Love will also provide you with an attorney and counselor that is specifically trained to meet the needs of pregnant women contemplating adoption in Texas. Our team is prepared to help you navigate through every step of the adoption process. Making the brave choice of placing your baby for adoption can often be an emotional and difficult journey. Our counselors are here to help you and understand that you may be dealing with a wide range of emotions. They will be available before, during, and after you baby’s birth to give guidance and answer any questions that may arise. Our attorneys are educated in Texas adoptions laws and are equipped to help you with any legal decision you may have to make. It is our job to uphold your rights at all times and to make this process as comfortable as possible for you.
list: Electricity, air conditioning, and other utilities

sections.heading: Support and Guidance are Just a Phone Call Away
paragraphs: It does not matter what stage of pregnancy you are in, we are ready to help you with all your needs in a relaxed, no-pressure environment. Make a positive choice for your child; it is never too late to call us!

CONTACT US TODAY! For more information about Adoptions With Love, please contact us today. Amy, Nancy, Jess, Kate, Carli, and Brittany are available toll-free any time of day, 24/7. Contact us by text (SMS) at 617-777-0072, by phone at 1-800-722-7731, or by email at info@awlonline.org. Our staff is here to answer your call any time of day or night, any day of the week.
